src:
Politiet mener denne skiltingen er lite forutsigbar
06 Nov 2019, 11:24 by Martin Andersen
Peker på to mulige konfliktområder i kryss der Olav Tryggvasons gate møter Søndre gate.
Adresseavisen fortalte tirsdag om kollektivfelt-skiltingen i Olav Tryggvasons gate i Trondheim. Der ble det nemlig i sommer satt opp feil type skilt.
text:
Police believe this signage is not predictable
06 Nov 2019, 11:24 by Martin Andersen
Points to two possible areas of conflict at junctions where Olav Tryggvasons gate meets Søndre gate.
On Tuesday, the address newspaper told about the collective field signage in Olav Tryggvasons gate in Trondheim. This is where the wrong type of sign was put up this summer.
